info.title: Server to Server Checkout API
info.description:
### Checkout
Allows for a checkout to be created from an existing cart using BigCommerce checkout logic. The existing BigCommerce front end cart/checkout can be bypassed.

Notes:
- checkoutId is the same as the cartId.

get.description:
Returns a *Checkout*.

**Notes**

The cart ID and checkout ID are the same.

404.description: When a given checkout ID is not found.

post.description:
Adds a billing address to an existing *Checkout*.

**Required Fields**
* email
* country_code

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Either email or countryCode is required.

field_value.description: This can also be an array for fields that need to support list of values (e.g., a set of check boxes.)

put.description: Updates an existing billing address on *Checkout*.

field_value.description: This can also be an array for fields that need to support list of values (e.g., a set of check boxes.)

post.description:
Adds a new *Consignment* to *Checkout*.


There are two steps to add a new shipping address and shipping options with line items. 
1. Add a [new Consignment](/api-reference/cart-checkout/server-server-checkout-api/checkout/checkoutsconsignmentsbycheckoutidpost) to Checkout.
	2. Send a POST to Consignments with each shipping address and line items IDs. Each address can have its own line item IDs.
	3. As part of the request URL make sure to add `include=consignments.available_shipping_options` to return the available shipping options based on line items and shipping locations. This will return `available_shipping_options` in the response.
3. [Update the Consignment](/api-reference/cart-checkout/server-server-checkout-api/checkout/checkoutsconsignmentsbycheckoutidandconsignmentidput) with Shipping Options.

**Required Query**
* consignments.available_shipping_options

**Required Fields**
* shipping_address
* line_items

field_value.description: This can also be an array for fields that need to support list of values (e.g., a set of check boxes.)

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Must be included to get available shipping options

put.description:
Updates an existing consignment. Shipping address, line item IDs or the shipping option ID can be updated using this endpoint.

There are two steps to add a new shipping address and shipping options with line items. 
1. Add a [new Consignment](/api-reference/cart-checkout/server-server-checkout-api/checkout/checkoutsconsignmentsbycheckoutidpost) to Checkout.
3. [Update the Consignment](/api-reference/cart-checkout/server-server-checkout-api/checkout/checkoutsconsignmentsbycheckoutidandconsignmentidput) with Shipping Options.
	4. Update each *Consignment* `shipping_option_id` (shipping address and line items) with the `available_shipping_option > id` from Step One. 


**Required Fields**
* shipping_option_id

schema.title: Update Consignment Request
schema.description: One or more of these three fields are mandatory. Shipping address and line items can be updated in one request. Shipping option ID has to be updated in a separate request, since changing the address or line items can invalidate the previously available shipping options.

field_value.description: This can also be an array for fields that need to support list of values (e.g., a set of check boxes.)

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Must be included to get available shipping options

delete.description:
Removes an existing consignment from checkout. 

Removing the last consigment will remove the Cart from the customer it is assigned to. Create a new rediret url for the customer to access it again.

post.description:
Adds a *Coupon Code* to *Checkout*.

**Required Fields**
* coupon_code

parameters.name: couponCode
parameters.description: The actual couponCode, not the couponId.

post.description:
Creates an *Order*. 

**Notes**

Orders created will be set to incomplete order status. 

You can create as many orders from the same order(cart) as you want. Order duplication creates the same order with a new order number with the incomplete status. 
Once the order is paid, then the cart is deleted. Cart deletion occurs if you are using BigCommerce to accept payments on orders.

id.description: Cart ID, provided after creating a cart with a POST.

customer_id.description: ID of the customer to which the cart belongs.

email.description: The cart's email. This is the same email that is used in the billing address

base_amount.description: Cost of cart's contents, before applying discounts.

cart_amount_inc_tax.description: Sum of line-items amounts, minus cart-level discounts and coupons including tax

cart_amount_ex_tax.description: Sum of line-items amounts, minus cart-level discounts and coupons excluding tax

coupon_type.description: Key name to identify the type of coupon.

discounted_amount.description: The discounted amount applied within a given context.
The discounted amount applied within a given context.

name.description: The item's product name.

discounted_amount.description: The discounted amount applied within a given context.

coupon_type.description: Key name to identify the type of coupon.

discounted_amount.description: The discounted amount applied within a given context.

discount_amount.description: The total value of all discounts applied to this item.

coupon_amount.description: The total value of all coupons applied to this item.

list_price.description: Item's list price, as quoted by the manufacturer/distributor.

sale_price.description: Item's price after all discounts are applied. (The final price before tax calculation.)

extended_list_price.description: Item's list price multiplied by the quantity.

extended_sale_price.description: Item's sale price multiplied by the quantity.

options.description: The list of selected options for this product.

name.description: The product option name. For example, Color or Size

value.description: The product option value. For example, Red or Medium

download_file_urls.description: URLs to download all product files.

download_page_url.description: The URL for the combined downloads page.

amount.description: Value must be between 1.00 and 1,000.00 in the store's default currency.

name.description: GiftCertificate-provided name that will appear in the control panel.

created_time.description: Time when the cart was created.

updated_time.description: Time when the cart was last updated.

field_value.description: This can also be an array for fields that need to support list of values (e.g., a set of check boxes.)

items.title: Consignment
items.description: This allows us to have multiple shipping addresses. Where there is only one shipping address, this array will contain only one value, with all the items.

field_value.description: This can also be an array for fields that need to support list of values (e.g., a set of check boxes.)

available_shipping_options.description: This is available only when "include=available_shipping_options" is presented in the URL.

type.description: Specified the type of shipping option. Flat rate, UPS, etc.,

transit_time.description: An estimate of the arrival time.

additional_description.description: ReadOnly, Field used for Shipping Provider API.

code.description: Coupon code that applied this discount

discounts.description: List of consignment discounts applied through cart level discounts

id.description: Discount rule ID that applied this discount

shipping_cost_ex_tax.description: The shipping cost for this consignment excluding tax.

handling_cost_total_ex_tax.description: Handling cost for all consignments excluding tax.

subtotal_inc_tax.description: Subtotal of the checkout before applying item level discounts including tax.

subtotal_ex_tax.description: Subtotal of the checkout before applying item level discounts excluding tax.

grand_total.description: The total payable amount, before applying any store credit or gift certificate.

Shipping option ID has to be updated in a separate request, since changing the address or line items can invalidate the previously available shipping options.
